Test EML metadata for publisher state

Source: R/required_eml_elements.R
test_publisher_state.Rd

test_publisher_state() inspects the publisher address in EML metadata. The test faisl with an error if the administrativeArea (state) element is empty. The test fails with a warning if it is not "CO" (again, because this is expected to be exceedingly rare). The test passes if it is "CO".

Usage

test_publisher_state(metadata = load_metadata(directory))

Arguments

metadata

The metadata object returned by load_metadata. If parameter is not provided, it defaults to calling load_metadata in the current project directory.

Value

invisibly returns metadata

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
test_publisher_state()
} # }
